api_token.description:
API_TOKEN generated by the VMware Cloud Services Console. If not set,
defaults to the environment variable TMC_API_TOKEN

org_url.description:
VMware Cloud Console Service URL unique to your organization. If not set,
defaults to the environment variable TMC_ORG_URL

credential_name.description: Kubernetes version of the AWS Cluster

management_cluster.description: Name of an existing management cluster to be used

pod_cidrblock.description: CIDR block used by the Cluster's Pods

provisioner_name.description: Name of an existing provisioner to be used

service_cidrblock.description: CIDR block used by the Cluster's Services

ssh_key.description: Name of the SSH Keypair used in the AWS Cluster

availability_zones.description: Availability zones of the control plane node

instance_type.description: Instance type used to deploy the control plane node

private_subnets.description: IDs of the private subnets in the specified availability zones

public_subnets.description: IDs of the public subnets in the specified availability zones

vpc_cidrblock.description: CIDR block used by the Cluster's VPC

vpc_id.description: ID of an existing VPC to be used

block.description: Contains information related to the Control Plane of the cluster

capability.description: Capability of the Tanzu Aws Data Protection Credential

credential_provider.description: Credential Provider of the Tanzu Aws Data Protection Credential

iam_role_arn.description: IAM Role Arn of the Tanzu Aws Data Protection Credential

id.description: Unique ID of the Tanzu Aws Data Protection Credential

name.description: Name of the Tanzu Aws Data Protection Credential

availability_zone.description: Availability zone of the worker node

cluster_name.description: Name of the cluster in which the nodepool is present

instance_type.description: Instance type used to deploy the worker node

management_cluster.description: Name of the management cluster used

name.description: Name of the Nodepool in the cluster

worker_node_count.description: Number of worker nodes in the nodepool

access_key_id.description: Access Key ID of the Tanzu Aws Storage Credential

capability.description: Capability of the Tanzu Aws Storage Credential

credential_provider.description: Credential Provider of the Tanzu Aws Storage Credential

id.description: Unique ID of the Tanzu Aws Storage Credential

name.description: Name of the Tanzu Aws Storage Credential

secret_access_key.description: Secret Access Key of the Tanzu Aws Storage Credential

excluded_namespaces.description: The namespaces to be excluded in the backup.

excluded_resources.description: The name list for the resources to be excluded in backup.

id.description: Unique ID of the Tanzu Cluster Backup

include_cluster_scoped_resources.description: A flag which specifies whether cluster-scoped resources should be included for consideration in the backup

included_namespaces.description: The namespaces to be included for backup from. If empty, all namespaces are included.

included_resources.description: The name list for the resources to be included into backup. If empty, all resources are included.

management_cluster_name.description: Name of the Tanzu Management Cluster

name.description: Unique Name of the Tanzu Cluster Backup

provisioner_name.description: Name of the Tanzu Management Cluster Provisioner

snapshot_volumes.description: A flag which specifies whether to take cloud snapshots of any PV's referenced in the set of objects included in the Backup.

storage_location.description: The name of a BackupStorageLocation where the backup should be stored.

volume_snapshot_locations.description: A list containing names of VolumeSnapshotLocations associated with this backup.

block.description: Label query over a set of resources to be included in backup.

description.description: Optional Description for the Tanzu Cluster Group

id.description: Unique ID of the Tanzu Cluster Group

name.description: Unique Name of the Tanzu Cluster Group in your Org

api_token.description: API Token of the Tanzu Observability Credential

capability.description: Capability of the Tanzu Observability Credential

id.description: Unique ID of the Tanzu Observability Credential

name.description: Name of the Tanzu Observability Credential

observability_url.description: URL of the Tanzu Observability Credential

id.description: Unique ID of the Tanzu Provisioner

management_cluster_name.description: Name of the Management Cluster which contains the Tanzu Provisioner

name.description: Unique Name of the Tanzu Provisioner in your Org

id.description: Unique ID of the Tanzu Workspace

control_plane_spec.description: Contains information related to the Control Plane of the cluster
